data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Groningen take a 1-0 lead thanks to Patrick Joosten.
In the minute 26, Jorgen Strand Larsen with an assist there.
The first-half is over at Hitachi Capital Mobility Stadium.
The second-half is underway at Hitachi Capital Mobility Stadium.
In the minute 46, The home team have replaced Daniel van Kaam with Ramon-Pascal Lundqvist. This is the first substitution made today by Danny Buijs.
The away team replace Tobias Pachonik with Stan Van Dijck.
Great finish from Jorgen Strand Larsen to give Groningen a 2-0 lead.
In the minute 48, That's a fine assist from Alessio Da Cruz.
Mo El Hankouri is replacing Alessio Da Cruz for the home team.
Torino Hunte is on a sub for Zinedine Machach for Venlo.
In the minute 62, Jafar Arias is replacing Simon Janssen for Venlo at Hitachi Capital Mobility Stadium.
Danny Buijs (Groningen) is making a third substitution, with Gabriel Gudmundsson replacing Patrick Joosten.
At Hitachi Capital Mobility Stadium, Gabriel Gudmundsson has been yellow-carded for the home team.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 2-1.
It seems as if Jorgen Strand Larsen is unable to continue. Remco Balk replaces him for the home team.
Goal! Giorgos Giakoumakis pulls one back for Venlo to make it 2-1.
Great play from Evert Linthorst to set up the goal.
